data.description: Interface to Irix syssgi system call
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The namespace is simply chosen from the systemcall name that the
    module is interfacing, syssgi on IRIX. It is listed under the SGI::
    namespace since it is IRIX specific. I believe this module should be
    listed in the module list since it provide Perl programmers with
    interfaces to the Irix system calls that so far hasnt been
    available.

    Sincerely

    Daniel Gustafson DEGE
